refnamediv.refpurpose: Start a listening process for OSC messages to a particular port.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Starts a listening process, which can be used by OSClisten.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: ihandle -- handle returned that can be passed to any number of OSClisten opcodes to receive messages on this port.
iport -- the port on which to listen.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: The listener runs in the background. See OSClisten for details.

refsect1.title: Example
refsect1.para: The example shows a pair of floating point numbers being received on port 7770.

informalexample.programlisting:
sr = 44100 ksmps = 100 nchnls = 2
gihandle OSCinit 7770
instr 1 kf1 init 0 kf2 init 0 nxtmsg: kk OSClisten gihandle, "/foo/bar", "ff", kf1, kf2 if (kk == 0) goto ex printk 0,kf1 printk 0,kf2 kgoto nxtmsg ex: endin
